short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Iboxreview streamlines web interaction, enhancing your browsing with comments, reviews, and deals discovery.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience a new way of online interaction with our completely free Chrome extension! Share and read reviews on any site with just one registration. Connect and socialize with other users, exchanging unique experiences, all at no cost. Plus, enjoy special coupons and offers as you browse, enhancing your web experience for free. Your voice matters with every click, and with us, it’s valued and amplified at no charge!

Enhance your online experience with our platform: voice your opinions through star ratings, share your unique stories, and connect with a community. As you engage, enjoy exclusive offers and discounts, rewarding your participation. It’s more than a service; it’s an interactive journey, offering community, savings, and discovery

Fast ibox in each web

Make your opinion shine: rate with stars and make a difference
Your voice, your story: share your experiences and connect with the community
Explore more, spend less: enjoy exclusive offers tailored for you

Key Features
Check any review, rating, and offer for free.
Just browse and you'll see the community's comments.
Turn iBox into a button for use whenever you want.
You can comment on any website in the world.
All data is for service use and is not transferred to third parties.
Receive personalized offers of your interest.
Get a init home page with all is happening in the community of iboxreview (likes, comments, reviews, offers).

“We aim to democratize comments, reviews, and opinions on any website, product, or service without companies being able to censor opinions. We also provide the option to leave reviews on websites that do not have comments, thereby helping users browse with greater confidence.”

“In our extension, our mission is to provide users with a safe and enriching online experience. We make web exploration easier by offering reliable comments and reviews about websites, companies, and products. We want users to share their experiences, browse with confidence, and take advantage of the best deals and discounts available. Our aim is to empower the online community to make informed decisions and make the most of their web experience.”

“In our platform, we value integrity, privacy, customer support, and authenticity. Our commitment is to provide honest and transparent information, protect the privacy of our users, offer excellent customer support, and promote sincerity in all reviews and comments. Our mission is to empower users to navigate with confidence, share their experiences, and take advantage of the best online deals.”
